text: Watashi ga doshite, anata gata no suhai suru mono o osoreyou ka. Kare ga nani no ken'no mo sadzuke rarenai mono o, anata gata wa osorezu ni arra ni nabete agamete irude wanai ka. Sorede ryogun (isshinkyo to tashinkyo) no dochiraga, motto heian o eru ni ataisuru no ka. Anata gataga moshi shitte irunara (kotae nasai)
